ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR ID for this CareTeam instance

ancillary-provider-poc-update.Name: extension
ancillary-provider-poc-update.Description: A string indicating whether each ancillary provider receives updates to the Plan of Care.

name.Name: name
name.Description: The name of the care team.

participant.Name: participant
participant.Description:
A participant in the care team.

In scenarios where a provider on the care team has multiple specialties, this service returns one participant element for each unique combination of provider and specialty. For example, if a provider is listed on the care team twice, once with a specialty of "Radiology" and once with a specialty of "Behavioral Health", there will be two participant elements returned by this resource. They will have the same member reference but will have different roles.

member.Name: member
member.Description: Reference to a care team member

period.Name: period
period.Description: The start date and end date of the participantâ€™s care team assignment.

participant-note.Name: extension
participant-note.Description: A string note that includes the number of visits with the participant each week and whether the participant receives Plan of Care updates.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The times the care team is active, from the earliest start date to the latest end date for any participant in the care team.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the episode for which the care team is defined.
